sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Certification Reimbursement">7abf6b42476b7110d570fa8bd36d43e2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Certification cost should be Numeric</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    // Get the form element


    // Get the field value by field name
    var fieldValue = g_form.getValue('u_certification_cost'); 

    // Check if the field value is numeric
    if (!isNumeric(fieldValue)) {
        // Display an alert or any other validation message
        alert('Please enter a numeric value for the field.');

        // Cancel form submission
        return false;
    }

    // Continue with form submission if the field value is numeric
    return true;
}

// Function to check if a value is numeric
function isNumeric(value) {
    return !isNaN(parseFloat(value)) && isFinite(value);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-07 21:12:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0437f2de47a3f110d570fa8bd36d43c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Certification cost should be Numeric</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0437f2de47a3f110d570fa8bd36d43c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-07 21:12:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

restrictedtrueon_desktopfalse109f0438c6112276003ae8ac13e7009d01970-01-03 00:00:00Only the certifications listed in the companies certification portal only applicable for reimbursement. For other certifications not listed on the portal, reimbursement approval from various stakeholders is required. 

List of vendors supported include ServiceNow, ITIL or PeopleCert, AWS, Azure, GCP, and CompTia.

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_821d4a56476fb110d570fa8bd36d43e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.CheckAttachmentCatalogItems</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script Include that checks if there is an attachment in the 'Certificate Reimburesement' item under Services in Service Catalog - created by Tomiwa Akinrotimi 01/07/2024</description><name>CheckAttachmentCatalogItems</name><script><![CDATA[var CheckAttachmentCatalogItems = Class.create();
CheckAttachmentCatalogItems.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    checkAttachment: function() {

		var catalogId = this.getParameter('sysparm_catalog_id');

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
        gr.addQuery('table_name', 'sc_cart_item'); //query the service catalog table - sc_req_item
        gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', catalogId); //the table sys id should come from the client side
        gr.query();

        var attachment = gr.getRowCount();
		return attachment;
    },

    type: 'CheckAttachmentCatalogItems'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-07 18:41:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>821d4a56476fb110d570fa8bd36d43e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckAttachmentCatalogItems</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_821d4a56476fb110d570fa8bd36d43e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-07 22:42:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_a737161647afb110d570fa8bd36d43e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Certification Reimbursement">7abf6b42476b7110d570fa8bd36d43e2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Check Attachment Mandatory</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var catalogsysid = gel('sysparm_item_guid').value;

    var testAjaxCall = new GlideAjax('global.CheckAttachmentCatalogItems');
    testAjaxCall.addParam('sysparm_name', 'checkAttachment');
    testAjaxCall.addParam('sysparm_catalog_id', catalogsysid);
    testAjaxCall.getXMLWait();

    var attachment = testAjaxCall.getAnswer();

    if (attachment > 1) {
        return true;
    } else if (attachment < 1) {
        alert('Please attach proof of certification to the form');
        return false;
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-07 19:26:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a737161647afb110d570fa8bd36d43e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Attachment Mandatory</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a737161647afb110d570fa8bd36d43e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-07 22:43:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_821d4a56476fb110d570fa8bd36d43e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.CheckAttachmentCatalogItems</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script Include that checks if there is an attachment in the 'Certificate Reimburesement' item under Services in Service Catalog - created by Tomiwa Akinrotimi 01/07/2024</description><name>CheckAttachmentCatalogItems</name><script><![CDATA[var CheckAttachmentCatalogItems = Class.create();
CheckAttachmentCatalogItems.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    checkAttachment: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
        gr.addQuery('table_name', 'sc_cart_item'); //query the service catalog table - sc_req_item
        gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', this.getParameter('sysparm_catalog_id')); //the table sys id should come from the client side
        gr.query();

        if (gr.next()) {
            return 'yes';
        } else {
            return 'no';
        }
    },

    type: 'CheckAttachmentCatalogItems'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-07 18:41:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>821d4a56476fb110d570fa8bd36d43e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckAttachmentCatalogItems</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_821d4a56476fb110d570fa8bd36d43e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-07 20:28:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_a737161647afb110d570fa8bd36d43e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Certification Reimbursement">7abf6b42476b7110d570fa8bd36d43e2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Check Attachment Mandatory</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var catalogItemId = g_form.getValue('sysparm_item_guid');

    var testAjaxCall = new GlideAjax('global.CheckAttachmentCatalogItems');
    testAjaxCall.addParam('sysparm_name', 'checkAttachment');
    testAjaxCall.addParam('sysparm_catalog_id', catalogItemId);
    testAjaxCall.getXMLWait();

    var attachment = testAjaxCall.getAnswer();

    if (attachment == 'yes') {
        return true;
    } else if (attachment == 'no') {
        alert('Please attach proof of certification to the form');
        return false;
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-07 19:26:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a737161647afb110d570fa8bd36d43e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Attachment Mandatory</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a737161647afb110d570fa8bd36d43e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-07 20:47:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
